climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: COMFORTABLE FOR EXTENDED TIME: Adating to your body, our versitle car seat cushion can help you to ease some of that back and posterior discomfort. Big enough for comfort, small enough for convenience! OEKO-TEX and Certi-PUR US certified

GREAT FOR POSTURE - This versatile home office chair cushion doesn't just promote lumbar support & relief, tailbone, and posterior discomfort - it also promotes a stronger seated posture. Enjoy lower back pain relief with this office chair back support!

WON'T FALL OFF CHAIR - Our cushions come with a handle for travel as outdoor chair cushions or seat cushions for office chairs. The anti-slip bottom of our chair pads are designed to keep your pillow in place.
FITS ALL TYPES OF SEATING: Could be used as a gaming chair cushion, car seat cushion, cushion for office chair, stadium seat cushion, trucking, and so much more.

CONVENIENT CLEANING - This office chair cushion comes with a black mesh cover that isn't all looks - it's breathable and machine washable too! Remove the zippered cover and toss it in the wash for an easy clean.

KEEPS SHAPE FOREVER: Sit on our versatile gaming chair pillow for back pain for as long as you like without worrying of flattening out. Wether you're working from home, driving, or gaming. Makes a great travel accessories; sit comfortably wherever you go

PORTABLE: Our butt pillow is a road trip essentials for adults! Use it as a car pillow for tailbone pain relief or cushion or as a home office accessories. Take this with you anywhere you go without occupying a lot of space.

NO MORE UNCOMFORTABLE CHAIRS: Our lumbar support pillow for office chair is a work from home essentials because it changes your you seat.This tailbone pain relief cushion takes into account weight applied and provides support where you need it most.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High-Quality Materials That Last Dual-Layered Foam Non-flattening filler conforms to your individual shape to relieve pressure points while maintaining density, support, and comfort. Breathable Mesh Comes with a durable mesh cover that provides superior air circulation designed to minimize sweating and keep you cool. Non-Skid Bottom The non-skid bottom keeps the cushion in place on slippery seating surfaces. Machine Washable Cover Zippered cover is removable and machine washable. Simply unzip, throw in a cold wash, and machine dry on low.

On-the-Go Support Home Office Our large seat cushion makes working from home more comfortable without having to splurge on an expensive office chair. Corporate Office Our cushion works as hard as you do. Bring it with you to the corporate office for all day comfort and support. Public Transportation Traveling on plane, bus, car, or train can keep you seated for long hours. Xtreme Comforts makes it easy for you to take us along for the ride. Live Events Got tickets to the big game? Turn hard benches into luxury seats with a portable Xtreme Comforts cushion.
Large Seat Cushion Coccyx Cushion Back Support Cushion Kool Flow Bamboo Pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Eases my hip pain
reviews.reviewText: This pillow adds a layer of comfort to hard chairs. I have a hamstring injury that is taking a long time to recover, so I actually carry this with me to restaurants. It doesn’t attract attention and it makes my life much more enjoyable. At home I use it on an office chair.This is bigger and wider than I expected, so it’s very comfortable. The removable cover is a great feature. It’s well made and it looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sit comfortably, game tirelessly!
reviews.reviewText: Gamers, my sons love this cushion. Do you want unmatched comfort during a day of gaming? With the Xtreme Comforts Seat Cushion—it will transform your experience into comfort & luxurious support. This cushion has revolutionized the boys (ok young men) gaming setup, making those intense gaming sessions a breeze.This cushion is body-adapting, a testament to the thoughtfulness behind the product. It’s engineered to conform to your body's contours, so it seems to alleviate back and butt discomfort, ensuring that every moment spent seated is comfortable (especially for extended periods of time). It’s crafted to strike the perfect balance between lavish comfort and convenient size, it's a seamless addition to any seating arrangement. Whether you're engrossed in an immersive gaming world or grinding through work tasks, this cushion seems to provide the support needed where and when you need it.There is this anti-slip bottom and convenient handle to make it an ideal travel companion (we’ve used it on an outdoor chair, an office seat, and a gaming throne) this cushion stays right where you want it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because I wanted something that was portable, convenient, and of course-- alleviated back pain. The cushion itself works just fine and is supportive. My criticism comes for the value for the money, as I paid over $30 for this item, I would say the investment in cost seemed to be more for the elaborate design than overall functionality of the item as the fabric is beginning to pill and the functionality of the item is basic. I did not have a giant blue handprint design on my cushion, simply a raised, sewn in design as pictured, however the "look" of the item was not why I purchased this. The back has a simple clasp and is slightly stretchy, but overall I feel I over-paid for this even if it works, estimating the cost to be more a greater value if there were more functional elements to the cushion.Overall point: Works fine ( not a miracle worker), supports but could probably find a comparable one for less money, Average quality of outer material, Decent-quality cushion comfort. Wouldn't re-purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Was great for a three day car drive to Arizona. Saved my hips!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought another one
reviews.reviewText: It stays in place and is comfortable without being too thick. I liked it so much I bought a second one for the office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars wrong color and no travel case
reviews.reviewText: While it is a soft large cushion that does fit on my office chair, it came in this light off-white color instead of the dark grey that I ordered. It also did not come with a travel bag as stated in the listing. It is only moderately comfortable in that it squishes down too far and I feel the hard surface of the chair through it. I find the surface covering on the cushion sort of rough/bumpy feeling while sitting on it."Xtreme Comforts Seat Cushion, Office Chair Cushions - Pack of 1 Padded Foam Cushion w/Handle for Desk, Wheelchair & Car Use - Back Support Pillow for Chair ﻿- Travel Bag Included (Dark Grey)"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t be without
reviews.reviewText: I have back pain and coccyx bone pain from an old injury. This seat cushion takes the pressure off the area that hurts. The cushion is well made. Has a removable washable cover and also comes with a convenient carrier case which has handles. I would think a carrying case would be important but I actually take my cushion to my appointments when I’ll have to sit for a while. Purchased one for my kitchen table chair, my art room chair and an extra for on the go. I did order another brand that was slightly cheaper and returned because this one is so much better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really soft bought this to support my back when i hand an accident at work damage my lower back it helps me out alot

reviews.reviewTitle: Highly satisfied user for the past 5 years and counting
reviews.reviewText: With this cushion, I'm able to drive on 12 hour, 700 km roadtrips as a solo driver in my family. It has the right blend of firmness and softness and the anti-skid material on the bottom prevents the cushion from sliding off when I get into the car or off it.Over my usage period of half a decade, the cushion has held its quality and still feels new, minus probably a bit of inevtiable compression losses to the foam material.
Comodísimo, no demasiado duro ni demasiado suave.

Ce coussin me sert de rehausseur sur mon fauteuil roulant. Il est très confortable, très stable, ne se déforme pas. Lors de grandes chaleurs estivales, il demeure frais. Je ne peux dire s’il contribue à diminuer les douleurs, car j’en ai pas. Je suis très satisfaite de mon choix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 5, 2020
reviews.reviewText: When this arrived rolled up like a swiss roll I thought 'If this can be rolled that tight its not going to provide much support' & I wasn't wrong - very thin cheap foam cushion being sold as supportive. If I could give this ZEROSTARS I would & for the price it's an absolute rip off!! As a wheelchair user I'm fed up with this cheap unsupportive foam rubbish being sold as something comfortable to sit on or providing any kind of support or relief from seating discomfort!!
